Name: Stork Club
Ingredients: 2 dash Orange Bitters by Angostura optional
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Gin and orange with a souring splash of lime juice.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Lucius Beebe's 1946 The Stork Club Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Stork Club contains 151 calories
